summary: Adds a missing Argonian Horn combo.
descriptionHtml:
Adds a missing Argonian Horn combo.

Since the release of skyrim, i have been wanting this particular combo, but either always put it off to try and add it myself or simply forgot it.

To me, i find it essential for Argonians. And the mod is so small and simple.

[b]How to install[/b]: Unzip the .esp file to the Data folder of Skyrim and activate it. Tadaaa~

[b]Requirements[/b]: Skyrim

[b]Recommendations [/b]That aren't really related to this mod, but just are cool: [url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/29624/?]Race Menu mod[/url], [url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/3863/?]SkyUI[/url], [url=http://skse.silverlock.org/]SKSE[/url], [url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/14152/?]Leveler's Tower[/url], [url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/9557/?]this mod[/url], [url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/51956/?]that mod[/url], [url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/19/?]those patches[/url], [url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/71042?]these fixes[/url], and so on and so forth.

Will update this mod once i play with the female Argonian and find out if there is any combos i feel like adding.
If i remember correctly, there is a similar missing combo missing, and if so, i'll add that too.

The edit/making of this mod was so simple, so if you like, go ahead and "steal" it or add it to your own mods...
But since no one ever thought of doing this, then at least i can offer it for you guys, so enjoy.

ALSO .. If you got any ideas of missing combos, let me know, and i'll try add it...
Maybe this hairstyle + feathers? - I'm sure that can be made possible, just let me know if it's something you'd like to see.
But remember, i got my limits to my editing skills :/
author: Donovan M
